Blackknight: The ship is okay, Phanna. Now come on, we'll go check 
other parts of the ship to see if we can find anyone. Meggy can even 
help us!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., HanaKirei85@a... wrote:
> <<> Blackknight: Talos, I have found Phanna. (Closes the line) Now, 
> > Phanna, you don't need to cry now that I'm here!>>
> 
> Phanna quieted downm but trembled "M-meggy an' me gotsa owchies..." 
she said, 
> re-stating what had been said earlier. Then asked "Is da 
shippy-wippy 
> okey-day?"
> 
> ~Phanna an' Meggy!
